2062670.name: Jones Demo
2062670.description:
Jones is a first person exploration game set in an endless void.

Players navigate through "pills" in order to explore the environment, while being coerced by an unknown voice that talks about your every little move.

You play as a teen, after leaving the bathroom you interact with the environment and make decisions that could impact your direction as the story progresses. Switching back and fourth from the void and certain parts of the your world you aren't sure what is real and you aren't sure what is the right move.

This experience lasts only 25-30 minutes.

Game Features:
- Different Endings
- Differing Environments
- A linear story set in a endless void
- Original Soundtrack
